title: Real Estate Website
description: RealEstate is a full-stack property listing platform with a Node.js backend and React frontend for seamless property exploration and purchasing.

title: VideoTube
description: VideoTube is a React-based video streaming app that integrates with the YouTube API, featuring debounced search functionality and live chat with API polling.

title: NutriTrack
description: NutriTrack is a health-focused application that helps users monitor their nutritional intake, track vitamin deficiencies, and make informed food choices, powered by a Spring Boot backend
